text: Fashion Trend Center was a museum in Bangkok, Thailand, established in November 2005 and closed on 30 September 2006. It covered a total area of 500 square metres located on the sixth floor of the offices at Central World Plaza and was run by the government. ==References== Category:Museums in Bangkok Category:Museums established in 2005 Category:2005 establishments in Thailand Category:Museums disestablished in 2006
title: Bangkok Fashion Trend Center
